channel.title: emacs on james mclaren

item.title: lowkey emacs setup
item.description: About a month ago I was a little bored and thought I’d give emacs a go. There’s something fun about trying out these mythical pieces of software that have been around forever; kind of like watching The Godfather for the first time. Like many extensible, super configurable programs, emacs seems kind of impenetrable at first glance. I tried doing the tutorial but kind of glazed over after a while with the endless stream of C-a C-b C-c.
